description: Jaipur, June 27 (ANI): The people of Jaipur staged a protest on Saturday demanding the resignation of Rajasthan Chief Minister Vasundhara Raje's resignation of the Lalit Modi row.
title: |Lalit Gate: People in Jaipur protest against Vasundhara Raje
title_page: |Lalit Gate: People in Jaipur protest against Vasundhara Raje
text:
Jaipur, June 27 (ANI): The people of Jaipur staged a protest on Saturday demanding the resignation of Rajasthan Chief Minister Vasundhara Raje's resignation of the Lalit Modi row.
The shouted slogans against Prime Minister Narendra Modi-led NDA Government.
The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP), which has been defending External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj despite opposition demands that she be sacked for helping Lalit Modi, was hit with another worry last week when the former IPL boss claimed that Rajasthan Chief Minister Vasundhara Raje secretly supported his immigration plea in Britain.
The opposition mounted pressure on Raje after the emergence of a letter reportedly carrying her signature, in which she backs Lalit Modi's application in the UK. (ANI)
